BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISSRT_PAR_OFF_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_SERIAL_NO, STR_VEH_NO, STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE, DT_OFFENCE_DATE, STR_OFFENCE_TIME, STR_LOCATION, STR_REMARKS, STR_WARNING_GIVEN, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISSRT_PAR_OFF_TRN SET STR_VEH_NO=?, DT_OFFENCE_DATE=?, STR_OFFENCE_TIME=?, STR_LOCATION=?, STR_REMARKS=?, STR_WARNING_GIVEN=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GDT_EFFECT_DATE=? WHERE STR_SERIAL_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISSRT_PAR_OFF_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_SERIAL_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
